about_the_game:
🎤🐾 Play with Your Voice, Embark on an Adventure!

A fun and energetic game for kids who love to shout! My nephew is always shouting, so I wanted to create a game where he could channel his energy in a fun and engaging way. Maybe you’d like to test how well you can control your voice too!

This game was designed as a special keepsake for my nephew and will be released on his birthday! 🎂🎁

🎮 How to Play?

🔹 Kitty Kitty Mode – Whisper or make a soft sound... That’s it! Our cat starts walking! But be careful—if you're too quiet, your cat might suddenly stop!
🔹 Meow Jump – Make a little more noise! Hoooop, our cat just jumped! But don’t overdo it, or you might fall into an unexpected trap!
🔹 Are the Doors Closed? – No problem! Raise your voice a bit more, be brave, and shout! Our cat will open the door! But be careful not to disturb the neighbors!

🖱️ Bonus Tip: Use the mouse scroll wheel to zoom in and out. Maybe you'd like to take a closer look at those adorable little paws! 😊

Are you ready to overcome obstacles using your voice? Grab your microphone and join this fantastic adventure! 🎤🐱

💛 If you enjoy the game, don’t forget to add it to your wishlist! That would be a huge motivation for me. Thank you in advance! 🙌🎮

  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz, AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 670 or AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
